remarks: Lemma for orthoarguesian law 5OA. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
5oalem2.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
5oalem2.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
5oalem2.3 $e |- C e. SH $.
5oalem2.4 $e |- D e. SH $.
5oalem2 $p |- ( ( ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ( z e. C /\ w e. D ) ) /\ ( x +h y ) = ( z +h w ) ) -> ( x -h z ) e. ( ( A +H C ) i^i ( B +H D ) ) ) $.
